Actions.Name: Create an event
Actions.Description: This operation is used to create an event on a specific calendar.

Actions.Name: Delete an event
Actions.Description: This operation is used to delete an event from a calendar.

Actions.Name: Get an event
Actions.Description: This operation is used to get the details of a specific event from a calendar.

Actions.Name: List calendars
Actions.Description: This operation is used to list all calendars in your Google account.

Actions.Name: List the events on a calendar
Actions.Description: This operation is used to return the first page of arbitrarily ordered events on the selected calendar.

Actions.Name: When an event is added, updated or deleted from a calendar
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new event is added, updated or deleted from a calendar.

Actions.Name: When an event is deleted from a calendar
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new event is deleted from a calendar.

Actions.Name: When an event starts
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when an event starts.

Actions.Name: When an event is added to a calendar
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new event is added to a calendar.

Actions.Name: When an event is updated in a calendar
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when an event is updated in a calendar.

Actions.Name: Update an event
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update an existing event on a calendar.
